scheduled_content.title: Reverb Plugin Introduction
scheduled_content.prompt: Quick intro to the new reverb plugin features

scheduled_content.title: Before & After Demo
scheduled_content.prompt: Show dramatic difference with reverb on/off

scheduled_content.title: Tutorial: Advanced Settings
scheduled_content.prompt: Deep dive into reverb parameters and controls

content_generation_workflow: 1. Use plugin info to understand the product and its unique features
2. Apply global_prompt for consistent brand voice and style
3. Use moodboard for visual style guidance (if provided)
4. Select appropriate assets from the assets list for each content piece
5. Generate content based on each scheduled_content item's prompt
6. Use template_key to match content with appropriate template settings
7. Ensure platform-specific optimization for each target platform

content_requirements.reel: 15-60 seconds, vertical 9:16, engaging hook in first 3 seconds
content_requirements.story: 15 seconds max, vertical 9:16, quick and engaging
content_requirements.post: Static or short video, square 1:1, informative and branded

asset_selection_guidance: Choose assets that best demonstrate the prompt requirements
Prefer audio assets for showcasing plugin sound
Use video assets for UI demonstrations
Combine multiple assets when needed for comprehensive content
template_usage: Use template settings to determine visual style constraints
FIXED mode parameters must be used exactly as specified
GUIDED mode parameters should stay within given constraints
FREE mode parameters can be chosen by AI
Project-wide templates provide base settings for all content
